page.title: 01AREA - GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: This block includes northern Brighouse;Bailiff Bridge and Lightcliffe to the north;Hipperholme to the northwest;Hove Edge and Southowram village to the west. The area contains streets of terraced houses,industrial areas,residential suburbs,open rough, farmland, quarries, meadows, hills and valleys. The surveys undertaken reflect this:a child's walk to her school, the schools and churches of the area, a farm visit, a visit to an industrial firm; descriptions of a house, clothes, youth club, spare time activities;a morning at home, a day in the life of one person; playground games, sports, a library, and a mill..
